meanings.sent1: The typewritten letter was easy to read.
meanings.sent2: She received a typewritten note from her friend.
meanings.sent3: The typewritten document made the old typewriter feel useful again.
meanings.sent4: Her typewritten words danced across the page like tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The typewritten text stood out among the handwritten notes.

meanings.sent1: He typewritten his report for the office.
meanings.sent2: She typewritten the address on the envelope.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to typewritten a message but only managed to type gibberish.
meanings.sent4: His fingers flew over the keys, typewritten the story in record time.
meanings.sent5: The author preferred to typewritten his novels rather than write by hand.
